data.name: DW8XLCE - SOLDIER & OFFICER UNIFORM SET
data.detailed_description:
This download enables the option to change the costumes of allied and enemy forces in FREE MODE.
The costumes comprise of 5 unique varieties which include uniforms, suits, and armor. Enjoy playing with your favorite characters in a variety of costume styles on the battlefield.

Soldiers' costumes can be applied within FREE MODE by going to CHANGE FORCE'S OUTFITS.

fullgame.name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition / 真・三國無双７ with 猛将伝

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 2.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
